      • getGuestDefaultHomePortal

        public com.jalios.jcms.portlet.PortalInterface getGuestDefaultHomePortal​(com.jalios.jcms.Member guest,
                                                                         com.jalios.jcms.portlet.PortalInterface defaultPortal)
        Retrieves the default home portal for given guest, with optional already forced portal.

        If portal is null or cannot be read by guest, a default home portal will be returned, or null if none can be found.

        Parameters:
        guest - the guest
        defaultPortal - an optional already set default portal to check if guest can read
        Returns:
        default portal if not null and readble by guest, or a new -readable- one, or null.
        Since:
        esn-6.2
